## Clase 13/11

# Simular una poisson

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

lamda=2

out = sapply(1:100, function(i) {
  u = runif(10)
  x = -log(1-u)/lamda  
  y=cumsum(x)
  length(which(y<=1))
})


set.seed(1)

mean(rpois(100,2))
var(rpois(100,2))

```

## Simular una NORMAL

Generamos uniformes 0-1  

```{r}
set.seed(1)
u = runif(100)

mean(u)

sum(u)- (length(u)*0.5) #Esperanza

```
